description: It is smart and very good quality music!
I have used many music player in Linux but hand down Banshee is by the far the most stable one it just simply works.
Banshee is by the far the most stable one it just simply works.
very nice very nice
Doesn't integrate with GNOME like Spotify/Rhythmbox.
I tried Rhythmbox and my only other alternative appeared to be Banshee. It just owns Rhythmbox in any case possible!
summary: The only really good player for Gnome!

description: Was not reading file names correctly. Had 85 MP3s in sequential order with appropriate file names 01-85, 02-85, 03-85, etc. Banshee somehow did not recognize that, made up its own file names and everything was out of order.
Banshee crashes the moment it starts.
Lags severely when playing mkv files.

It has some nice features likethe ability to pick and chose the locations of videos vs music and audiobooks. I installed all the codecs and even other music players read fine but it has issues with large amounts of data causing parts of it to crash and unable to automatically update the library. Attempted to manually add the entire folder only caused things to get garbled into a mess but at least it read all the information correctly. I remeber using this years ao and it used to be better.

Too many crashes. Even ripping CDs would cause it to crash. And every crash would corrupt the db, causing it to crash at next start (until the db is removed or fixed).

As much as I'd like to use it as an iTunes replacement, I've to look for something else.

Refuses to open a folder with subfolders. Upon choosing "Open location" I can browse to my main folder with music (containing subfolders). but when clicking "open" it does not show me all the music in that location, but instead just browses into the highlighted subfolder.
summary: Refuses to open a folder with subfolders

description: Crashes whenever sync to an MTP Android device is attempted. Freezes randomly. Using Fedora 27 w. GNOME.
when i open the app it freezes
crash while starting
Doesnt works on CentOS 7. Just crash before start, even on install sometimes.
No response as soon as I started it.

It crashes wen it starts !
I'm on fedora 29
work on fedora 30

1) It plays a wide range of music formats (mp3 - HD FLAC (even 24bit 192kHz)).
2) Opens fast even with a rather large library of music (148,000 songs).
3) I love the (community) extension to display the album cover art as the background image on one of my monitors (the 'Cover Art Wallpaper' extension).
4) Rescans the library pretty fast (which I need to do ocasionally).
5) The interface is better then the alternatives, again being able to see the full-sized cover art is a plus.

It is not all pros; occasionally the database (a flat file) gets corrupted and I have to rebuild, or temperamental for other reasons. Changes to existing cover art have to be manually edited in the database - interesting.

In summary, this is not a great app, but I find it much better then the other GNU/Linux options (I have tried many of them).
summary: Not Perfect but better then the other free options

description: Crashes constantly, can't even import music.
summary: Used to be a great music player..

description: I don't Know why people give Banshee a hard time ,i have used it for a while now and find it great.It has an iTunes style album browser and a good equaliser which you can set to your own preferences.The only gripe is trying to put videos on it seems to just crash it but i use VLC for that anyway. It's not perfect but like all the apps on Ubuntu it is FREE which is something a lot of users seem to forget.Ubuntu is not perfect full stop but what do you want for nothing??????
Crashes on boot every time.
summary: Opens for half a second and crashes

description: I don't play video mp4
Crashes when trying to play music. Worked great in 16.04.

Quite a great app, lesser crashes and the most beautiful audio output without using PulseEffects and all that. I love it. 

Uli Mahlangu
summary: This is even better than Rhythmbox

description: I only had to download this program because my lecturer is teaching about killing programs in terminals.

I have two nearly identical Ubuntu 18.04 builds here at home. I don't understand why but Banshee works nearly perfectly on one of them and constantly freezes on the other. For the life of me I can't determine why. This app works fine on an older version of Ubuntu I have round the house as well. So I can't give it too few stars. It's unfortunate. Because this would most likely be nearly the best media center for Ubuntu out there if it were with it.

Banshee would get 5 stars from me if it weren't for the fact that it seems so hit or miss. I have 7 Linux builds in my home, two of which are nearly identical machines. I just don't get it, of those 7 Banshee only works perfectly on one of the nearly identical builds... both running Ubuntu 18.04 0.o I'm at a loss. For the life of me I can't fathom why this is the situation. It works flawlessly on one of my Ubuntu machines. I LOVE IT! I'm able to manage all my movies, tunes, podcasts and audio books with it on that machine. It's actually rather exciting. Because it is exactly what I long for on all my Linux machines. But I can only enjoy this on one system. ??? I wish the developers would update this app. It rocks when it works.
What a crappy code that is unable even to import any folder
summary: Unable to import folder with music

description: even though it's getting old and not supported anymore, it's the best music player on the planet! TIP: Don't use the import feature to add music, use the "rescan library" it works faster than import anyway!
This piece of mess doesnt even work, first of all

Banshee fast alles: normales Musikhören, Hörbücher, Podcasts, Webradio, Wiedergabelisten, Metadateneditor mit Stapelverarbeitung. Viele nützliche Plugins. Kann auch Videos verwalten und abspielen. Fügt sich gut in GNOME ein. Leider ist Banshee nicht ganz stabil und wird aber auch nicht mehr weiterentwickelt.
summary: Immer noch einer der besten Alleskönner

OUTDATED!! wir sind in 2019!!

description: Hace tiempo que no actualizan este reproductor, me pregunto por qué?....
en realidad me gusta, esta muy bien diseñado, y es muy funcional, pero desde hace algunas versiones se cierra solo, no puedo usarlo.
Ne marche pas sous Fedora.
Ne fonctionne pas sous Fedora.
Banshee n'est plus développée depuis 2014. C'est bien dommage car cette application mériterait d'évoluer. Par exemple, elle ne sait lire les TAG des fichiers OPUS. Passez votre chemin.
A peine lancé, bloque tout le Pc. Et ce, à chaque fois.
При попытке импортировать аудиокниги, виснет наглухо.
Приложение не без недостатков.

Похоже перестали поддерживать приложение. Понравилось тем, что был рандом по альбомам (настроение альбома задавало). Но перестало импортировать и искать файлы в библиотеку - зависает на глухо. Теперь нашёл другой плеер, удаляю этот.
Плеер запускается но при попытке добавить музыку выключается сам или зависает(. Удалил его .
При открытии mp4 вылетает, при повторном запуске вешает оболочку. Ubuntu 18.04 64 bit.
